name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MASTER SEO Tool- SERP Counter & Meta

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our SEO Tool check website and  displays all kind of important meta data information like Title,Description,Canonical etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our SEO Tool  display all important meta information like title with it's length , description with it's length, keyword with it's length, canonical URL , 
word length, character length etc. and we focused on these features like header tag display , all kind of images display with download button and much more......
Main Features: 
✔ SERP COUNTER TOOL
✔ H TAG INFORMATION
✔ IMAGE DETAILS DISPLAY WITH DOWNLOAD
✔ MULTI URL OPENER
✔ INTERNAL LINKS HIGHLIGHTER

We concentrate on showing:

✅ SERP Count display on search
✅ All H tag (H1,H2,H3,H4,H5,H6) details display.
✅ Title display with it's length
✅  Description display with it's length     
✅ An analysis of the number of images with and without ALTs, Title,
✅ Allow Image Download  in an easy way
✅ URL - Canonical URL display
✅ Open Multi URL at a time.
✅ Highlight all internal links
✅ The list goes on and on......
